Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package prometheus-node-exporter for versions less than 1.3.1-23
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package prometheus-node-exporter for versions less than 1.3.1-23. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus-node-exporter is earlier than 1.3.1-23, affected by CVE-2022-21698
